segments.text: Did you read the letter in the paper about smoking ? The person who wrote that must be crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I think the government should do everything it can to discourage people from smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe so . But a law banning cigarettes would do no good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No.You can't suddenly make smoking illegal . But the government could prohibit smoking in public places like cinemas and theaters .
segments.speaker: S2
